46 const std::string TrajectoryExecutionManager::EXECUTION_EVENT_TOPIC = "trajectory_execution_event";
47 
48 static const ros::Duration DEFAULT_CONTROLLER_INFORMATION_VALIDITY_AGE(1.0);
49 static const double DEFAULT_CONTROLLER_GOAL_DURATION_MARGIN = 0.5; // allow 0.5s more than the expected execution time
50  // before triggering a trajectory cancel (applied
51  // after scaling)
52 static const double DEFAULT_CONTROLLER_GOAL_DURATION_SCALING =
53  1.1; // allow the execution of a trajectory to take more time than expected (scaled by a value > 1)
54 
55 using namespace moveit_ros_planning;
56 
57 class TrajectoryExecutionManager::DynamicReconfigureImpl
58 {
59 public:
60  DynamicReconfigureImpl(TrajectoryExecutionManager* owner)
61  : owner_(owner), dynamic_reconfigure_server_(ros::NodeHandle("~/trajectory_execution"))
62  {
63  dynamic_reconfigure_server_.setCallback(
64  boost::bind(&DynamicReconfigureImpl::dynamicReconfigureCallback, this, _1, _2));
65  }
66 
67 private:
68  void dynamicReconfigureCallback(TrajectoryExecutionDynamicReconfigureConfig& config, uint32_t /*level*/)
69  {
70  owner_->enableExecutionDurationMonitoring(config.execution_duration_monitoring);
71  owner_->setAllowedExecutionDurationScaling(config.allowed_execution_duration_scaling);
72  owner_->setAllowedGoalDurationMargin(config.allowed_goal_duration_margin);
73  owner_->setExecutionVelocityScaling(config.execution_velocity_scaling);
74  owner_->setAllowedStartTolerance(config.allowed_start_tolerance);
75  owner_->setWaitForTrajectoryCompletion(config.wait_for_trajectory_completion);
76  }
77 
78  TrajectoryExecutionManager* owner_;
79  dynamic_reconfigure::Server<TrajectoryExecutionDynamicReconfigureConfig> dynamic_reconfigure_server_;
80 };

82 TrajectoryExecutionManager::TrajectoryExecutionManager(const moveit::core::RobotModelConstPtr& robot_model,
83  const planning_scene_monitor::CurrentStateMonitorPtr& csm)
84  : robot_model_(robot_model), csm_(csm), node_handle_("~")
85 {
86  if (!node_handle_.getParam("moveit_manage_controllers", manage_controllers_))
87  manage_controllers_ = false;
88 
89  initialize();
90 }

92 TrajectoryExecutionManager::TrajectoryExecutionManager(const moveit::core::RobotModelConstPtr& robot_model,
93  const planning_scene_monitor::CurrentStateMonitorPtr& csm,
94  bool manage_controllers)
95  : robot_model_(robot_model), csm_(csm), node_handle_("~"), manage_controllers_(manage_controllers)
96 {
97  initialize();
98 }

100 TrajectoryExecutionManager::~TrajectoryExecutionManager()
101 {
102  run_continuous_execution_thread_ = false;
103  stopExecution(true);
104  delete reconfigure_impl_;
105 }
106 
107 void TrajectoryExecutionManager::initialize()
108 {
109  reconfigure_impl_ = nullptr;
110  verbose_ = false;
111  execution_complete_ = true;
112  stop_continuous_execution_ = false;
113  current_context_ = -1;
114  last_execution_status_ = moveit_controller_manager::ExecutionStatus::SUCCEEDED;
115  run_continuous_execution_thread_ = true;
116  execution_duration_monitoring_ = true;
117  execution_velocity_scaling_ = 1.0;
118  allowed_start_tolerance_ = 0.01;
119 
120  allowed_execution_duration_scaling_ = DEFAULT_CONTROLLER_GOAL_DURATION_SCALING;
121  allowed_goal_duration_margin_ = DEFAULT_CONTROLLER_GOAL_DURATION_MARGIN;
122 
123  // load controller-specific values for allowed_execution_duration_scaling and allowed_goal_duration_margin
124  loadControllerParams();
125 
126  // load the controller manager plugin
127  try
128  {
129  controller_manager_loader_ =
130  std::make_unique<pluginlib::ClassLoader<moveit_controller_manager::MoveItControllerManager>>(
131  "moveit_core", "moveit_controller_manager::MoveItControllerManager");
132  }
133  catch (pluginlib::PluginlibException& ex)
134  {
135  ROS_FATAL_STREAM_NAMED(name_, "Exception while creating controller manager plugin loader: " << ex.what());
136  return;
137  }
138 
139  if (controller_manager_loader_)
140  {
141  std::string controller;
142  if (!node_handle_.getParam("moveit_controller_manager", controller))
143  {
144  const std::vector<std::string>& classes = controller_manager_loader_->getDeclaredClasses();
145  if (classes.size() == 1)
146  {
147  controller = classes[0];
148  ROS_WARN_NAMED(name_,
149  "Parameter '~moveit_controller_manager' is not specified but only one "
150  "matching plugin was found: '%s'. Using that one.",
151  controller.c_str());
152  }
153  else
154  ROS_FATAL_NAMED(name_, "Parameter '~moveit_controller_manager' not specified. This is needed to "
155  "identify the plugin to use for interacting with controllers. No paths can "
156  "be executed.");
157  }
158 
159  if (!controller.empty())
160  try
161  {
162  controller_manager_ = controller_manager_loader_->createUniqueInstance(controller);
163  }
164  catch (pluginlib::PluginlibException& ex)
165  {
166  ROS_FATAL_STREAM_NAMED(name_,
167  "Exception while loading controller manager '" << controller << "': " << ex.what());
168  }
169  }
170 
171  // other configuration steps
172  reloadControllerInformation();
173 
174  event_topic_subscriber_ =
175  root_node_handle_.subscribe(EXECUTION_EVENT_TOPIC, 100, &TrajectoryExecutionManager::receiveEvent, this);
176 
177  reconfigure_impl_ = new DynamicReconfigureImpl(this);
178 
179  if (manage_controllers_)
180  ROS_INFO_NAMED(name_, "Trajectory execution is managing controllers");
181  else
182  ROS_INFO_NAMED(name_, "Trajectory execution is not managing controllers");
183 }
184

225 void TrajectoryExecutionManager::processEvent(const std::string& event)
226 {
227  if (event == "stop")
228  stopExecution(true);
229  else
230  ROS_WARN_STREAM_NAMED(name_, "Unknown event type: '" << event << "'");
231 }
232 
233 void TrajectoryExecutionManager::receiveEvent(const std_msgs::StringConstPtr& event)
234 {
235  ROS_INFO_STREAM_NAMED(name_, "Received event '" << event->data << "'");
236  processEvent(event->data);
237 }

240 {

243  else
244  return push(trajectory, std::vector<std::string>(1, controller));
245 }

255 bool TrajectoryExecutionManager::push(const trajectory_msgs::JointTrajectory& trajectory,
256  const std::vector<std::string>& controllers)
257 {
258  moveit_msgs::RobotTrajectory traj;
259  traj.joint_trajectory = trajectory;
260  return push(traj, controllers);
261 }
262 
263 bool TrajectoryExecutionManager::push(const moveit_msgs::RobotTrajectory& trajectory,
264  const std::vector<std::string>& controllers)
265 {
266  if (!execution_complete_)
267  {
268  ROS_ERROR_NAMED(name_, "Cannot push a new trajectory while another is being executed");
269  return false;
270  }
271 
272  TrajectoryExecutionContext* context = new TrajectoryExecutionContext();
273  if (configure(*context, trajectory, controllers))
274  {
275  if (verbose_)
276  {
277  std::stringstream ss;
278  ss << "Pushed trajectory for execution using controllers [ ";
279  for (const std::string& controller : context->controllers_)
280  ss << controller << " ";
281  ss << "]:" << std::endl;
282  for (const moveit_msgs::RobotTrajectory& trajectory_part : context->trajectory_parts_)
283  ss << trajectory_part << std::endl;
284  ROS_INFO_NAMED(name_, "%s", ss.str().c_str());
285  }
286  trajectories_.push_back(context);
287  return true;
288  }
289  else
290  {
291  delete context;
292  last_execution_status_ = moveit_controller_manager::ExecutionStatus::ABORTED;
293  }
294 
295  return false;
296 }
297 
298 bool TrajectoryExecutionManager::pushAndExecute(const moveit_msgs::RobotTrajectory& trajectory,
299  const std::string& controller)
300 {
301  if (controller.empty())
302  return pushAndExecute(trajectory, std::vector<std::string>());
303  else
304  return pushAndExecute(trajectory, std::vector<std::string>(1, controller));
305 }

313  return pushAndExecute(trajectory, std::vector<std::string>(1, controller));

316 bool TrajectoryExecutionManager::pushAndExecute(const sensor_msgs::JointState& state, const std::string& controller)
317 {
318  if (controller.empty())
319  return pushAndExecute(state, std::vector<std::string>());
320  else
321  return pushAndExecute(state, std::vector<std::string>(1, controller));

324 bool TrajectoryExecutionManager::pushAndExecute(const trajectory_msgs::JointTrajectory& trajectory,
325  const std::vector<std::string>& controllers)
326 {
327  moveit_msgs::RobotTrajectory traj;
328  traj.joint_trajectory = trajectory;
329  return pushAndExecute(traj, controllers);
330 }
331 
332 bool TrajectoryExecutionManager::pushAndExecute(const sensor_msgs::JointState& state,
333  const std::vector<std::string>& controllers)
334 {
335  moveit_msgs::RobotTrajectory traj;
336  traj.joint_trajectory.header = state.header;
337  traj.joint_trajectory.joint_names = state.name;
338  traj.joint_trajectory.points.resize(1);
339  traj.joint_trajectory.points[0].positions = state.position;
340  traj.joint_trajectory.points[0].velocities = state.velocity;
341  traj.joint_trajectory.points[0].effort = state.effort;
342  traj.joint_trajectory.points[0].time_from_start = ros::Duration(0, 0);
343  return pushAndExecute(traj, controllers);
344 }
345 
346 bool TrajectoryExecutionManager::pushAndExecute(const moveit_msgs::RobotTrajectory& trajectory,
347  const std::vector<std::string>& controllers)
348 {
349  if (!execution_complete_)
350  {
351  ROS_ERROR_NAMED(name_, "Cannot push & execute a new trajectory while another is being executed");
352  return false;
353  }
354 
355  TrajectoryExecutionContext* context = new TrajectoryExecutionContext();
356  if (configure(*context, trajectory, controllers))
357  {
358  {
359  boost::mutex::scoped_lock slock(continuous_execution_mutex_);
360  continuous_execution_queue_.push_back(context);
361  if (!continuous_execution_thread_)
362  continuous_execution_thread_ =
363  std::make_unique<boost::thread>(boost::bind(&TrajectoryExecutionManager::continuousExecutionThread, this));
364  }
365  last_execution_status_ = moveit_controller_manager::ExecutionStatus::SUCCEEDED;
366  continuous_execution_condition_.notify_all();
367  return true;
368  }
369  else
370  {
371  delete context;
372  last_execution_status_ = moveit_controller_manager::ExecutionStatus::ABORTED;
373  return false;
374  }
375 }
376 
377 void TrajectoryExecutionManager::continuousExecutionThread()
378 {
379  std::set<moveit_controller_manager::MoveItControllerHandlePtr> used_handles;
380  while (run_continuous_execution_thread_)
381  {
382  if (!stop_continuous_execution_)
383  {
384  boost::unique_lock<boost::mutex> ulock(continuous_execution_mutex_);
385  while (continuous_execution_queue_.empty() && run_continuous_execution_thread_ && !stop_continuous_execution_)
386  continuous_execution_condition_.wait(ulock);
387  }
388 
389  if (stop_continuous_execution_ || !run_continuous_execution_thread_)
390  {
391  for (const moveit_controller_manager::MoveItControllerHandlePtr& used_handle : used_handles)
392  if (used_handle->getLastExecutionStatus() == moveit_controller_manager::ExecutionStatus::RUNNING)
393  used_handle->cancelExecution();
394  used_handles.clear();
395  while (!continuous_execution_queue_.empty())
396  {
397  TrajectoryExecutionContext* context = continuous_execution_queue_.front();
398  continuous_execution_queue_.pop_front();
399  delete context;
400  }
401  stop_continuous_execution_ = false;
402  continue;
403  }
404 
405  while (!continuous_execution_queue_.empty())
406  {
407  TrajectoryExecutionContext* context = nullptr;
408  {
409  boost::mutex::scoped_lock slock(continuous_execution_mutex_);
410  if (continuous_execution_queue_.empty())
411  break;
412  context = continuous_execution_queue_.front();
413  continuous_execution_queue_.pop_front();
414  if (continuous_execution_queue_.empty())
415  continuous_execution_condition_.notify_all();
416  }
417 
418  // remove handles we no longer need
419  std::set<moveit_controller_manager::MoveItControllerHandlePtr>::iterator uit = used_handles.begin();
420  while (uit != used_handles.end())
421  if ((*uit)->getLastExecutionStatus() != moveit_controller_manager::ExecutionStatus::RUNNING)
422  {
423  std::set<moveit_controller_manager::MoveItControllerHandlePtr>::iterator to_erase = uit;
424  ++uit;
425  used_handles.erase(to_erase);
426  }
427  else
428  ++uit;
429 
430  // now send stuff to controllers
431 
432  // first make sure desired controllers are active
433  if (areControllersActive(context->controllers_))
434  {
435  // get the controller handles needed to execute the new trajectory
436  std::vector<moveit_controller_manager::MoveItControllerHandlePtr> handles(context->controllers_.size());
437  for (std::size_t i = 0; i < context->controllers_.size(); ++i)
438  {
439  moveit_controller_manager::MoveItControllerHandlePtr h;
440  try
441  {
442  h = controller_manager_->getControllerHandle(context->controllers_[i]);
443  }
444  catch (std::exception& ex)
445  {
446  ROS_ERROR_NAMED(name_, "%s caught when retrieving controller handle", ex.what());
447  }
448  if (!h)
449  {
450  last_execution_status_ = moveit_controller_manager::ExecutionStatus::ABORTED;
451  ROS_ERROR_NAMED(name_, "No controller handle for controller '%s'. Aborting.",
452  context->controllers_[i].c_str());
453  handles.clear();
454  break;
455  }
456  handles[i] = h;
457  }
458 
459  if (stop_continuous_execution_ || !run_continuous_execution_thread_)
460  {
461  delete context;
462  break;
463  }
464 
465  // push all trajectories to all controllers simultaneously
466  if (!handles.empty())
467  for (std::size_t i = 0; i < context->trajectory_parts_.size(); ++i)
468  {
469  bool ok = false;
470  try
471  {
472  ok = handles[i]->sendTrajectory(context->trajectory_parts_[i]);
473  }
474  catch (std::exception& ex)
475  {
476  ROS_ERROR_NAMED(name_, "Caught %s when sending trajectory to controller", ex.what());
477  }
478  if (!ok)
479  {
480  for (std::size_t j = 0; j < i; ++j)
481  try
482  {
483  handles[j]->cancelExecution();
484  }
485  catch (std::exception& ex)
486  {
487  ROS_ERROR_NAMED(name_, "Caught %s when canceling execution", ex.what());
488  }
489  ROS_ERROR_NAMED(name_, "Failed to send trajectory part %zu of %zu to controller %s", i + 1,
490  context->trajectory_parts_.size(), handles[i]->getName().c_str());
491  if (i > 0)
492  ROS_ERROR_NAMED(name_, "Cancelling previously sent trajectory parts");
493  last_execution_status_ = moveit_controller_manager::ExecutionStatus::ABORTED;
494  handles.clear();
495  break;
496  }
497  }
498  delete context;
499 
500  // remember which handles we used
501  for (const moveit_controller_manager::MoveItControllerHandlePtr& handle : handles)
502  used_handles.insert(handle);
503  }
504  else
505  {
506  ROS_ERROR_NAMED(name_, "Not all needed controllers are active. Cannot push and execute. You can try "
507  "calling ensureActiveControllers() before pushAndExecute()");
508  last_execution_status_ = moveit_controller_manager::ExecutionStatus::ABORTED;
509  delete context;
510  }
511  }
512  }
513 }
514 
515 void TrajectoryExecutionManager::reloadControllerInformation()
516 {
517  known_controllers_.clear();
518  if (controller_manager_)
519  {
520  std::vector<std::string> names;
521  controller_manager_->getControllersList(names);
522  for (const std::string& name : names)
523  {
524  std::vector<std::string> joints;
525  controller_manager_->getControllerJoints(name, joints);
526  ControllerInformation ci;
527  ci.name_ = name;
528  ci.joints_.insert(joints.begin(), joints.end());
529  known_controllers_[ci.name_] = ci;
530  }
531 
532  for (std::map<std::string, ControllerInformation>::iterator it = known_controllers_.begin();
533  it != known_controllers_.end(); ++it)
534  for (std::map<std::string, ControllerInformation>::iterator jt = known_controllers_.begin();
535  jt != known_controllers_.end(); ++jt)
536  if (it != jt)
537  {
538  std::vector<std::string> intersect;
539  std::set_intersection(it->second.joints_.begin(), it->second.joints_.end(), jt->second.joints_.begin(),
540  jt->second.joints_.end(), std::back_inserter(intersect));
541  if (!intersect.empty())
542  {
543  it->second.overlapping_controllers_.insert(jt->first);
544  jt->second.overlapping_controllers_.insert(it->first);
545  }
546  }
547  }
548 }
549 
550 void TrajectoryExecutionManager::updateControllerState(const std::string& controller, const ros::Duration& age)
551 {
552  std::map<std::string, ControllerInformation>::iterator it = known_controllers_.find(controller);
553  if (it != known_controllers_.end())
554  updateControllerState(it->second, age);
555  else
556  ROS_ERROR_NAMED(name_, "Controller '%s' is not known.", controller.c_str());
557 }
558 
559 void TrajectoryExecutionManager::updateControllerState(ControllerInformation& ci, const ros::Duration& age)
560 {
561  if (ros::Time::now() - ci.last_update_ >= age)
562  {
563  if (controller_manager_)
564  {
565  if (verbose_)
566  ROS_INFO_NAMED(name_, "Updating information for controller '%s'.", ci.name_.c_str());
567  ci.state_ = controller_manager_->getControllerState(ci.name_);
568  ci.last_update_ = ros::Time::now();
569  }
570  }
571  else if (verbose_)
572  ROS_INFO_NAMED(name_, "Information for controller '%s' is assumed to be up to date.", ci.name_.c_str());
573 }
574 
575 void TrajectoryExecutionManager::updateControllersState(const ros::Duration& age)
576 {
577  for (std::pair<const std::string, ControllerInformation>& known_controller : known_controllers_)
578  updateControllerState(known_controller.second, age);
579 }
580 
581 bool TrajectoryExecutionManager::checkControllerCombination(std::vector<std::string>& selected,
582  const std::set<std::string>& actuated_joints)
583 {
584  std::set<std::string> combined_joints;
585  for (const std::string& controller : selected)
586  {
587  const ControllerInformation& ci = known_controllers_[controller];
588  combined_joints.insert(ci.joints_.begin(), ci.joints_.end());
589  }
590 
591  if (verbose_)
592  {
593  std::stringstream ss, saj, sac;
594  for (const std::string& controller : selected)
595  ss << controller << " ";
596  for (const std::string& actuated_joint : actuated_joints)
597  saj << actuated_joint << " ";
598  for (const std::string& combined_joint : combined_joints)
599  sac << combined_joint << " ";
600  ROS_INFO_NAMED(name_, "Checking if controllers [ %s] operating on joints [ %s] cover joints [ %s]",
601  ss.str().c_str(), sac.str().c_str(), saj.str().c_str());
602  }
603 
604  return std::includes(combined_joints.begin(), combined_joints.end(), actuated_joints.begin(), actuated_joints.end());
605 }
606 
607 void TrajectoryExecutionManager::generateControllerCombination(std::size_t start_index, std::size_t controller_count,
608  const std::vector<std::string>& available_controllers,
609  std::vector<std::string>& selected_controllers,
610  std::vector<std::vector<std::string>>& selected_options,
611  const std::set<std::string>& actuated_joints)
612 {
613  if (selected_controllers.size() == controller_count)
614  {
615  if (checkControllerCombination(selected_controllers, actuated_joints))
616  selected_options.push_back(selected_controllers);
617  return;
618  }
619 
620  for (std::size_t i = start_index; i < available_controllers.size(); ++i)
621  {
622  bool overlap = false;
623  const ControllerInformation& ci = known_controllers_[available_controllers[i]];
624  for (std::size_t j = 0; j < selected_controllers.size() && !overlap; ++j)
625  {
626  if (ci.overlapping_controllers_.find(selected_controllers[j]) != ci.overlapping_controllers_.end())
627  overlap = true;
628  }
629  if (overlap)
630  continue;
631  selected_controllers.push_back(available_controllers[i]);
632  generateControllerCombination(i + 1, controller_count, available_controllers, selected_controllers,
633  selected_options, actuated_joints);
634  selected_controllers.pop_back();
635  }
636 }
637 
638 namespace
639 {
640 struct OrderPotentialControllerCombination
641 {
642  bool operator()(const std::size_t a, const std::size_t b) const
643  {
644  // preference is given to controllers marked as default
645  if (nrdefault[a] > nrdefault[b])
646  return true;
647  if (nrdefault[a] < nrdefault[b])
648  return false;
649 
650  // and then to ones that operate on fewer joints
651  if (nrjoints[a] < nrjoints[b])
652  return true;
653  if (nrjoints[a] > nrjoints[b])
654  return false;
655 
656  // and then to active ones
657  if (nractive[a] < nractive[b])
658  return true;
659  if (nractive[a] > nractive[b])
660  return false;
661 
662  return false;
663  }
664 
665  std::vector<std::vector<std::string>> selected_options;
666  std::vector<std::size_t> nrdefault;
667  std::vector<std::size_t> nrjoints;
668  std::vector<std::size_t> nractive;
669 };
670 } // namespace
671 
672 bool TrajectoryExecutionManager::findControllers(const std::set<std::string>& actuated_joints,
673  std::size_t controller_count,
674  const std::vector<std::string>& available_controllers,
675  std::vector<std::string>& selected_controllers)
676 {
677  // generate all combinations of controller_count controllers that operate on disjoint sets of joints
678  std::vector<std::string> work_area;
679  OrderPotentialControllerCombination order;
680  std::vector<std::vector<std::string>>& selected_options = order.selected_options;
681  generateControllerCombination(0, controller_count, available_controllers, work_area, selected_options,
682  actuated_joints);
683 
684  if (verbose_)
685  {
686  std::stringstream saj;
687  std::stringstream sac;
688  for (const std::string& available_controller : available_controllers)
689  sac << available_controller << " ";
690  for (const std::string& actuated_joint : actuated_joints)
691  saj << actuated_joint << " ";
692  ROS_INFO_NAMED(name_, "Looking for %zu controllers among [ %s] that cover joints [ %s]. Found %zd options.",
693  controller_count, sac.str().c_str(), saj.str().c_str(), selected_options.size());
694  }
695 
696  // if none was found, this is a problem
697  if (selected_options.empty())
698  return false;
699 
700  // if only one was found, return it
701  if (selected_options.size() == 1)
702  {
703  selected_controllers.swap(selected_options[0]);
704  return true;
705  }
706 
707  // if more options were found, evaluate them all and return the best one
708 
709  // count how many default controllers are used in each reported option, and how many joints are actuated in total by
710  // the selected controllers,
711  // to use that in the ranking of the options
712  order.nrdefault.resize(selected_options.size(), 0);
713  order.nrjoints.resize(selected_options.size(), 0);
714  order.nractive.resize(selected_options.size(), 0);
715  for (std::size_t i = 0; i < selected_options.size(); ++i)
716  {
717  for (std::size_t k = 0; k < selected_options[i].size(); ++k)
718  {
719  updateControllerState(selected_options[i][k], DEFAULT_CONTROLLER_INFORMATION_VALIDITY_AGE);
720  const ControllerInformation& ci = known_controllers_[selected_options[i][k]];
721 
722  if (ci.state_.default_)
723  order.nrdefault[i]++;
724  if (ci.state_.active_)
725  order.nractive[i]++;
726  order.nrjoints[i] += ci.joints_.size();
727  }
728  }
729 
730  // define a bijection to compute the raking of the found options
731  std::vector<std::size_t> bijection(selected_options.size(), 0);
732  for (std::size_t i = 0; i < selected_options.size(); ++i)
733  bijection[i] = i;
734 
735  // sort the options
736  std::sort(bijection.begin(), bijection.end(), order);
737 
738  // depending on whether we are allowed to load & unload controllers,
739  // we have different preference on deciding between options
740  if (!manage_controllers_)
741  {
742  // if we can't load different options at will, just choose one that is already loaded
743  for (std::size_t i = 0; i < selected_options.size(); ++i)
744  if (areControllersActive(selected_options[bijection[i]]))
745  {
746  selected_controllers.swap(selected_options[bijection[i]]);
747  return true;
748  }
749  }
750 
751  // otherwise, just use the first valid option
752  selected_controllers.swap(selected_options[bijection[0]]);
753  return true;
754 }
755 
756 bool TrajectoryExecutionManager::isControllerActive(const std::string& controller)
757 {
758  return areControllersActive(std::vector<std::string>(1, controller));
759 }
760 
761 bool TrajectoryExecutionManager::areControllersActive(const std::vector<std::string>& controllers)
762 {
763  for (const std::string& controller : controllers)
764  {
765  updateControllerState(controller, DEFAULT_CONTROLLER_INFORMATION_VALIDITY_AGE);
766  std::map<std::string, ControllerInformation>::iterator it = known_controllers_.find(controller);
767  if (it == known_controllers_.end() || !it->second.state_.active_)
768  return false;
769  }
770  return true;
771 }
772 
773 bool TrajectoryExecutionManager::selectControllers(const std::set<std::string>& actuated_joints,
774  const std::vector<std::string>& available_controllers,
775  std::vector<std::string>& selected_controllers)
776 {
777  for (std::size_t i = 1; i <= available_controllers.size(); ++i)
778  if (findControllers(actuated_joints, i, available_controllers, selected_controllers))
779  {
780  // if we are not managing controllers, prefer to use active controllers even if there are more of them
781  if (!manage_controllers_ && !areControllersActive(selected_controllers))
782  {
783  std::vector<std::string> other_option;
784  for (std::size_t j = i + 1; j <= available_controllers.size(); ++j)
785  if (findControllers(actuated_joints, j, available_controllers, other_option))
786  {
787  if (areControllersActive(other_option))
788  {
789  selected_controllers = other_option;
790  break;
791  }
792  }
793  }
794  return true;
795  }
796  return false;
797 }
798 
799 bool TrajectoryExecutionManager::distributeTrajectory(const moveit_msgs::RobotTrajectory& trajectory,
800  const std::vector<std::string>& controllers,
801  std::vector<moveit_msgs::RobotTrajectory>& parts)
802 {
803  parts.clear();
804  parts.resize(controllers.size());
805 
806  std::set<std::string> actuated_joints_mdof;
807  actuated_joints_mdof.insert(trajectory.multi_dof_joint_trajectory.joint_names.begin(),
808  trajectory.multi_dof_joint_trajectory.joint_names.end());
809  std::set<std::string> actuated_joints_single;
810  for (const std::string& joint_name : trajectory.joint_trajectory.joint_names)
811  {
812  const moveit::core::JointModel* jm = robot_model_->getJointModel(joint_name);
813  if (jm)
814  {
815  if (jm->isPassive() || jm->getMimic() != nullptr || jm->getType() == moveit::core::JointModel::FIXED)
816  continue;
817  actuated_joints_single.insert(jm->getName());
818  }
819  }
820 
821  for (std::size_t i = 0; i < controllers.size(); ++i)
822  {
823  std::map<std::string, ControllerInformation>::iterator it = known_controllers_.find(controllers[i]);
824  if (it == known_controllers_.end())
825  {
826  ROS_ERROR_STREAM_NAMED(name_, "Controller " << controllers[i] << " not found.");
827  return false;
828  }
829  std::vector<std::string> intersect_mdof;
830  std::set_intersection(it->second.joints_.begin(), it->second.joints_.end(), actuated_joints_mdof.begin(),
831  actuated_joints_mdof.end(), std::back_inserter(intersect_mdof));
832  std::vector<std::string> intersect_single;
833  std::set_intersection(it->second.joints_.begin(), it->second.joints_.end(), actuated_joints_single.begin(),
834  actuated_joints_single.end(), std::back_inserter(intersect_single));
835  if (intersect_mdof.empty() && intersect_single.empty())
836  ROS_WARN_STREAM_NAMED(name_, "No joints to be distributed for controller " << controllers[i]);
837  {
838  if (!intersect_mdof.empty())
839  {
840  std::vector<std::string>& jnames = parts[i].multi_dof_joint_trajectory.joint_names;
841  jnames.insert(jnames.end(), intersect_mdof.begin(), intersect_mdof.end());
842  std::map<std::string, std::size_t> index;
843  for (std::size_t j = 0; j < trajectory.multi_dof_joint_trajectory.joint_names.size(); ++j)
844  index[trajectory.multi_dof_joint_trajectory.joint_names[j]] = j;
845  std::vector<std::size_t> bijection(jnames.size());
846  for (std::size_t j = 0; j < jnames.size(); ++j)
847  bijection[j] = index[jnames[j]];
848 
849  parts[i].multi_dof_joint_trajectory.points.resize(trajectory.multi_dof_joint_trajectory.points.size());
850  for (std::size_t j = 0; j < trajectory.multi_dof_joint_trajectory.points.size(); ++j)
851  {
852  parts[i].multi_dof_joint_trajectory.points[j].time_from_start =
853  trajectory.multi_dof_joint_trajectory.points[j].time_from_start;
854  parts[i].multi_dof_joint_trajectory.points[j].transforms.resize(bijection.size());
855  for (std::size_t k = 0; k < bijection.size(); ++k)
856  {
857  parts[i].multi_dof_joint_trajectory.points[j].transforms[k] =
858  trajectory.multi_dof_joint_trajectory.points[j].transforms[bijection[k]];
859 
860  if (!trajectory.multi_dof_joint_trajectory.points[j].velocities.empty())
861  {
862  parts[i].multi_dof_joint_trajectory.points[j].velocities.resize(bijection.size());
863 
864  parts[i].multi_dof_joint_trajectory.points[j].velocities[0].linear.x =
865  trajectory.multi_dof_joint_trajectory.points[j].velocities[0].linear.x * execution_velocity_scaling_;
866 
867  parts[i].multi_dof_joint_trajectory.points[j].velocities[0].linear.y =
868  trajectory.multi_dof_joint_trajectory.points[j].velocities[0].linear.y * execution_velocity_scaling_;
869 
870  parts[i].multi_dof_joint_trajectory.points[j].velocities[0].linear.z =
871  trajectory.multi_dof_joint_trajectory.points[j].velocities[0].linear.z * execution_velocity_scaling_;
872 
873  parts[i].multi_dof_joint_trajectory.points[j].velocities[0].angular.x =
874  trajectory.multi_dof_joint_trajectory.points[j].velocities[0].angular.x * execution_velocity_scaling_;
875 
876  parts[i].multi_dof_joint_trajectory.points[j].velocities[0].angular.y =
877  trajectory.multi_dof_joint_trajectory.points[j].velocities[0].angular.y * execution_velocity_scaling_;
878 
879  parts[i].multi_dof_joint_trajectory.points[j].velocities[0].angular.z =
880  trajectory.multi_dof_joint_trajectory.points[j].velocities[0].angular.z * execution_velocity_scaling_;
881  }
882  }
883  }
884  }
885  if (!intersect_single.empty())
886  {
887  std::vector<std::string>& jnames = parts[i].joint_trajectory.joint_names;
888  jnames.insert(jnames.end(), intersect_single.begin(), intersect_single.end());
889  parts[i].joint_trajectory.header = trajectory.joint_trajectory.header;
890  std::map<std::string, std::size_t> index;
891  for (std::size_t j = 0; j < trajectory.joint_trajectory.joint_names.size(); ++j)
892  index[trajectory.joint_trajectory.joint_names[j]] = j;
893  std::vector<std::size_t> bijection(jnames.size());
894  for (std::size_t j = 0; j < jnames.size(); ++j)
895  bijection[j] = index[jnames[j]];
896  parts[i].joint_trajectory.points.resize(trajectory.joint_trajectory.points.size());
897  for (std::size_t j = 0; j < trajectory.joint_trajectory.points.size(); ++j)
898  {
899  parts[i].joint_trajectory.points[j].time_from_start = trajectory.joint_trajectory.points[j].time_from_start;
900  if (!trajectory.joint_trajectory.points[j].positions.empty())
901  {
902  parts[i].joint_trajectory.points[j].positions.resize(bijection.size());
903  for (std::size_t k = 0; k < bijection.size(); ++k)
904  parts[i].joint_trajectory.points[j].positions[k] =
905  trajectory.joint_trajectory.points[j].positions[bijection[k]];
906  }
907  if (!trajectory.joint_trajectory.points[j].velocities.empty())
908  {
909  parts[i].joint_trajectory.points[j].velocities.resize(bijection.size());
910  for (std::size_t k = 0; k < bijection.size(); ++k)
911  parts[i].joint_trajectory.points[j].velocities[k] =
912  trajectory.joint_trajectory.points[j].velocities[bijection[k]] * execution_velocity_scaling_;
913  }
914  if (!trajectory.joint_trajectory.points[j].accelerations.empty())
915  {
916  parts[i].joint_trajectory.points[j].accelerations.resize(bijection.size());
917  for (std::size_t k = 0; k < bijection.size(); ++k)
918  parts[i].joint_trajectory.points[j].accelerations[k] =
919  trajectory.joint_trajectory.points[j].accelerations[bijection[k]];
920  }
921  if (!trajectory.joint_trajectory.points[j].effort.empty())
922  {
923  parts[i].joint_trajectory.points[j].effort.resize(bijection.size());
924  for (std::size_t k = 0; k < bijection.size(); ++k)
925  parts[i].joint_trajectory.points[j].effort[k] =
926  trajectory.joint_trajectory.points[j].effort[bijection[k]];
927  }
928  }
929  }
930  }
931  }
932  return true;
933 }
934 
935 bool TrajectoryExecutionManager::validate(const TrajectoryExecutionContext& context) const
936 {
937  if (allowed_start_tolerance_ == 0) // skip validation on this magic number
938  return true;
939 
940  ROS_DEBUG_NAMED(name_, "Validating trajectory with allowed_start_tolerance %g", allowed_start_tolerance_);
941 
942  moveit::core::RobotStatePtr current_state;
943  if (!csm_->waitForCurrentState(ros::Time::now()) || !(current_state = csm_->getCurrentState()))
944  {
945  ROS_WARN_NAMED(name_, "Failed to validate trajectory: couldn't receive full current joint state within 1s");
946  return false;
947  }
948 
949  for (const auto& trajectory : context.trajectory_parts_)
950  {
951  if (!trajectory.joint_trajectory.points.empty())
952  {
953  // Check single-dof trajectory
954  const std::vector<double>& positions = trajectory.joint_trajectory.points.front().positions;
955  const std::vector<std::string>& joint_names = trajectory.joint_trajectory.joint_names;
956  if (positions.size() != joint_names.size())
957  {
958  ROS_ERROR_NAMED(name_, "Wrong trajectory: #joints: %zu != #positions: %zu", joint_names.size(),
959  positions.size());
960  return false;
961  }
962 
963  for (std::size_t i = 0, end = joint_names.size(); i < end; ++i)
964  {
965  const moveit::core::JointModel* jm = current_state->getJointModel(joint_names[i]);
966  if (!jm)
967  {
968  ROS_ERROR_STREAM_NAMED(name_, "Unknown joint in trajectory: " << joint_names[i]);
969  return false;
970  }
971 
972  double cur_position = current_state->getJointPositions(jm)[0];
973  double traj_position = positions[i];
974  // normalize positions and compare
975  jm->enforcePositionBounds(&cur_position);
976  jm->enforcePositionBounds(&traj_position);
977  if (jm->distance(&cur_position, &traj_position) > allowed_start_tolerance_)
978  {
979  ROS_ERROR_NAMED(name_,
980  "\nInvalid Trajectory: start point deviates from current robot state more than %g"
981  "\njoint '%s': expected: %g, current: %g",
982  allowed_start_tolerance_, joint_names[i].c_str(), traj_position, cur_position);
983  return false;
984  }
985  }
986  }
987  if (!trajectory.multi_dof_joint_trajectory.points.empty())
988  {
989  // Check multi-dof trajectory
990  const std::vector<geometry_msgs::Transform>& transforms =
991  trajectory.multi_dof_joint_trajectory.points.front().transforms;
992  const std::vector<std::string>& joint_names = trajectory.multi_dof_joint_trajectory.joint_names;
993  if (transforms.size() != joint_names.size())
994  {
995  ROS_ERROR_NAMED(name_, "Wrong trajectory: #joints: %zu != #transforms: %zu", joint_names.size(),
996  transforms.size());
997  return false;
998  }
999 
1000  for (std::size_t i = 0, end = joint_names.size(); i < end; ++i)
1001  {
1002  const moveit::core::JointModel* jm = current_state->getJointModel(joint_names[i]);
1003  if (!jm)
1004  {
1005  ROS_ERROR_STREAM_NAMED(name_, "Unknown joint in trajectory: " << joint_names[i]);
1006  return false;
1007  }
1008 
1009  // compute difference (offset vector and rotation angle) between current transform
1010  // and start transform in trajectory
1011  Eigen::Isometry3d cur_transform, start_transform;
1012  // computeTransform() computes a valid isometry by contract
1013  jm->computeTransform(current_state->getJointPositions(jm), cur_transform);
1014  start_transform = tf2::transformToEigen(transforms[i]);
1015  ASSERT_ISOMETRY(start_transform) // unsanitized input, could contain a non-isometry
1016  Eigen::Vector3d offset = cur_transform.translation() - start_transform.translation();
1017  Eigen::AngleAxisd rotation;
1018  rotation.fromRotationMatrix(cur_transform.linear().transpose() * start_transform.linear());
1019  if ((offset.array() > allowed_start_tolerance_).any() || rotation.angle() > allowed_start_tolerance_)
1020  {
1021  ROS_ERROR_STREAM_NAMED(name_, "\nInvalid Trajectory: start point deviates from current robot state more than "
1022  << allowed_start_tolerance_ << "\nmulti-dof joint '" << joint_names[i]
1023  << "': pos delta: " << offset.transpose()
1024  << " rot delta: " << rotation.angle());
1025  return false;
1026  }
1027  }
1028  }
1029  }
1030  return true;
1031 }
1032 
1033 bool TrajectoryExecutionManager::configure(TrajectoryExecutionContext& context,
1034  const moveit_msgs::RobotTrajectory& trajectory,
1035  const std::vector<std::string>& controllers)
1036 {
1037  if (trajectory.multi_dof_joint_trajectory.points.empty() && trajectory.joint_trajectory.points.empty())
1038  {
1039  // empty trajectories don't need to configure anything
1040  return true;
1041  }
1042  std::set<std::string> actuated_joints;
1043 
1044  auto is_actuated = [this](const std::string& joint_name) -> bool {
1045  const moveit::core::JointModel* jm = robot_model_->getJointModel(joint_name);
1046  return (jm && !jm->isPassive() && !jm->getMimic() && jm->getType() != moveit::core::JointModel::FIXED);
1047  };
1048  for (const std::string& joint_name : trajectory.multi_dof_joint_trajectory.joint_names)
1049  if (is_actuated(joint_name))
1050  actuated_joints.insert(joint_name);
1051  for (const std::string& joint_name : trajectory.joint_trajectory.joint_names)
1052  if (is_actuated(joint_name))
1053  actuated_joints.insert(joint_name);
1054 
1055  if (actuated_joints.empty())
1056  {
1057  ROS_WARN_NAMED(name_, "The trajectory to execute specifies no joints");
1058  return false;
1059  }
1060 
1061  if (controllers.empty())
1062  {
1063  bool retry = true;
1064  bool reloaded = false;
1065  while (retry)
1066  {
1067  retry = false;
1068  std::vector<std::string> all_controller_names;
1069  for (std::map<std::string, ControllerInformation>::const_iterator it = known_controllers_.begin();
1070  it != known_controllers_.end(); ++it)
1071  all_controller_names.push_back(it->first);
1072  if (selectControllers(actuated_joints, all_controller_names, context.controllers_))
1073  {
1074  if (distributeTrajectory(trajectory, context.controllers_, context.trajectory_parts_))
1075  return true;
1076  }
1077  else
1078  {
1079  // maybe we failed because we did not have a complete list of controllers
1080  if (!reloaded)
1081  {
1082  reloadControllerInformation();
1083  reloaded = true;
1084  retry = true;
1085  }
1086  }
1087  }
1088  }
1089  else
1090  {
1091  // check if the specified controllers are valid names;
1092  // if they appear not to be, try to reload the controller information, just in case they are new in the system
1093  bool reloaded = false;
1094  for (const std::string& controller : controllers)
1095  if (known_controllers_.find(controller) == known_controllers_.end())
1096  {
1097  reloadControllerInformation();
1098  reloaded = true;
1099  break;
1100  }
1101  if (reloaded)
1102  for (const std::string& controller : controllers)
1103  if (known_controllers_.find(controller) == known_controllers_.end())
1104  {
1105  ROS_ERROR_NAMED(name_, "Controller '%s' is not known", controller.c_str());
1106  return false;
1107  }
1108  if (selectControllers(actuated_joints, controllers, context.controllers_))
1109  {
1110  if (distributeTrajectory(trajectory, context.controllers_, context.trajectory_parts_))
1111  return true;
1112  }
1113  }
1114  std::stringstream ss;
1115  for (const std::string& actuated_joint : actuated_joints)
1116  ss << actuated_joint << " ";
1117  ROS_ERROR_NAMED(name_, "Unable to identify any set of controllers that can actuate the specified joints: [ %s]",
1118  ss.str().c_str());
1119 
1120  std::stringstream ss2;
1121  std::map<std::string, ControllerInformation>::const_iterator mi;
1122  for (mi = known_controllers_.begin(); mi != known_controllers_.end(); mi++)
1123  {
1124  ss2 << "controller '" << mi->second.name_ << "' controls joints:\n";
1125 
1126  std::set<std::string>::const_iterator ji;
1127  for (ji = mi->second.joints_.begin(); ji != mi->second.joints_.end(); ji++)
1128  {
1129  ss2 << " " << *ji << std::endl;
1130  }
1131  }
1132  ROS_ERROR_NAMED(name_, "Known controllers and their joints:\n%s", ss2.str().c_str());
1133  return false;
1134 }
1135 
1136 moveit_controller_manager::ExecutionStatus TrajectoryExecutionManager::executeAndWait(bool auto_clear)
1137 {
1138  execute(ExecutionCompleteCallback(), auto_clear);
1139  return waitForExecution();
1140 }
1141 
1142 void TrajectoryExecutionManager::stopExecutionInternal()
1143 {
1144  // execution_state_mutex_ needs to have been locked by the caller
1145  for (moveit_controller_manager::MoveItControllerHandlePtr& active_handle : active_handles_)
1146  try
1147  {
1148  active_handle->cancelExecution();
1149  }
1150  catch (std::exception& ex)
1151  {
1152  ROS_ERROR_NAMED(name_, "Caught %s when canceling execution.", ex.what());
1153  }
1154 }
1155 
1156 void TrajectoryExecutionManager::stopExecution(bool auto_clear)
1157 {
1158  stop_continuous_execution_ = true;
1159  continuous_execution_condition_.notify_all();
1160 
1161  if (!execution_complete_)
1162  {
1163  execution_state_mutex_.lock();
1164  if (!execution_complete_)
1165  {
1166  // we call cancel for all active handles; we know these are not being modified as we loop through them because of
1167  // the lock
1168  // we mark execution_complete_ as true ahead of time. Using this flag, executePart() will know that an external
1169  // trigger to stop has been received
1170  execution_complete_ = true;
1171  stopExecutionInternal();
1172 
1173  // we set the status here; executePart() will not set status when execution_complete_ is true ahead of time
1174  last_execution_status_ = moveit_controller_manager::ExecutionStatus::PREEMPTED;
1175  execution_state_mutex_.unlock();
1176  ROS_INFO_NAMED(name_, "Stopped trajectory execution.");
1177 
1178  // wait for the execution thread to finish
1179  boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(execution_thread_mutex_);
1180  if (execution_thread_)
1181  {
1182  execution_thread_->join();
1183  execution_thread_.reset();
1184  }
1185 
1186  if (auto_clear)
1187  clear();
1188  }
1189  else
1190  execution_state_mutex_.unlock();
1191  }
1192  else if (execution_thread_) // just in case we have some thread waiting to be joined from some point in the past, we
1193  // join it now
1194  {
1195  boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(execution_thread_mutex_);
1196  if (execution_thread_)
1197  {
1198  execution_thread_->join();
1199  execution_thread_.reset();
1200  }
1201  }
1202 }
1203 
1204 void TrajectoryExecutionManager::execute(const ExecutionCompleteCallback& callback, bool auto_clear)
1205 {
1206  execute(callback, PathSegmentCompleteCallback(), auto_clear);
1207 }
1208 
1209 void TrajectoryExecutionManager::execute(const ExecutionCompleteCallback& callback,
1210  const PathSegmentCompleteCallback& part_callback, bool auto_clear)
1211 {
1212  stopExecution(false);
1213 
1214  // check whether first trajectory starts at current robot state
1215  if (!trajectories_.empty() && !validate(*trajectories_.front()))
1216  {
1217  last_execution_status_ = moveit_controller_manager::ExecutionStatus::ABORTED;
1218  if (auto_clear)
1219  clear();
1220  if (callback)
1221  callback(last_execution_status_);
1222  return;
1223  }
1224 
1225  // start the execution thread
1226  execution_complete_ = false;
1227  execution_thread_ = std::make_unique<boost::thread>(&TrajectoryExecutionManager::executeThread, this, callback,
1228  part_callback, auto_clear);
1229 }
1230 
1231 moveit_controller_manager::ExecutionStatus TrajectoryExecutionManager::waitForExecution()
1232 {
1233  {
1234  boost::unique_lock<boost::mutex> ulock(execution_state_mutex_);
1235  while (!execution_complete_)
1236  execution_complete_condition_.wait(ulock);
1237  }
1238  {
1239  boost::unique_lock<boost::mutex> ulock(continuous_execution_mutex_);
1240  while (!continuous_execution_queue_.empty())
1241  continuous_execution_condition_.wait(ulock);
1242  }
1243 
1244  // this will join the thread for executing sequences of trajectories
1245  stopExecution(false);
1246 
1247  return last_execution_status_;
1248 }
1249 
1250 void TrajectoryExecutionManager::clear()
1251 {
1252  if (execution_complete_)
1253  {
1254  for (TrajectoryExecutionContext* trajectory : trajectories_)
1255  delete trajectory;
1256  trajectories_.clear();
1257  {
1258  boost::mutex::scoped_lock slock(continuous_execution_mutex_);
1259  while (!continuous_execution_queue_.empty())
1260  {
1261  delete continuous_execution_queue_.front();
1262  continuous_execution_queue_.pop_front();
1263  }
1264  }
1265  }
1266  else
1267  ROS_ERROR_NAMED(name_, "Cannot push a new trajectory while another is being executed");
1268 }
1269 
1270 void TrajectoryExecutionManager::executeThread(const ExecutionCompleteCallback& callback,
1271  const PathSegmentCompleteCallback& part_callback, bool auto_clear)
1272 {
1273  // if we already got a stop request before we even started anything, we abort
1274  if (execution_complete_)
1275  {
1276  last_execution_status_ = moveit_controller_manager::ExecutionStatus::ABORTED;
1277  if (callback)
1278  callback(last_execution_status_);
1279  return;
1280  }
1281 
1282  ROS_DEBUG_NAMED(name_, "Starting trajectory execution ...");
1283  // assume everything will be OK
1284  last_execution_status_ = moveit_controller_manager::ExecutionStatus::SUCCEEDED;
1285 
1286  // execute each trajectory, one after the other (executePart() is blocking) or until one fails.
1287  // on failure, the status is set by executePart(). Otherwise, it will remain as set above (success)
1288  std::size_t i = 0;
1289  for (; i < trajectories_.size(); ++i)
1290  {
1291  bool epart = executePart(i);
1292  if (epart && part_callback)
1293  part_callback(i);
1294  if (!epart || execution_complete_)
1295  {
1296  ++i;
1297  break;
1298  }
1299  }
1300 
1301  // only report that execution finished successfully when the robot actually stopped moving
1302  if (last_execution_status_ == moveit_controller_manager::ExecutionStatus::SUCCEEDED)
1303  waitForRobotToStop(*trajectories_[i - 1]);
1304 
1305  ROS_INFO_NAMED(name_, "Completed trajectory execution with status %s ...", last_execution_status_.asString().c_str());
1306 
1307  // notify whoever is waiting for the event of trajectory completion
1308  execution_state_mutex_.lock();
1309  execution_complete_ = true;
1310  execution_state_mutex_.unlock();
1311  execution_complete_condition_.notify_all();
1312 
1313  // clear the paths just executed, if needed
1314  if (auto_clear)
1315  clear();
1316 
1317  // call user-specified callback
1318  if (callback)
1319  callback(last_execution_status_);
1320 }
1321 
1322 bool TrajectoryExecutionManager::executePart(std::size_t part_index)
1323 {
1324  TrajectoryExecutionContext& context = *trajectories_[part_index];
1325 
1326  // first make sure desired controllers are active
1327  if (ensureActiveControllers(context.controllers_))
1328  {
1329  // stop if we are already asked to do so
1330  if (execution_complete_)
1331  return false;
1332 
1333  std::vector<moveit_controller_manager::MoveItControllerHandlePtr> handles;
1334  {
1335  boost::mutex::scoped_lock slock(execution_state_mutex_);
1336  if (!execution_complete_)
1337  {
1338  // time indexing uses this member too, so we lock this mutex as well
1339  time_index_mutex_.lock();
1340  current_context_ = part_index;
1341  time_index_mutex_.unlock();
1342  active_handles_.resize(context.controllers_.size());
1343  for (std::size_t i = 0; i < context.controllers_.size(); ++i)
1344  {
1345  moveit_controller_manager::MoveItControllerHandlePtr h;
1346  try
1347  {
1348  h = controller_manager_->getControllerHandle(context.controllers_[i]);
1349  }
1350  catch (std::exception& ex)
1351  {
1352  ROS_ERROR_NAMED(name_, "Caught %s when retrieving controller handle", ex.what());
1353  }
1354  if (!h)
1355  {
1356  active_handles_.clear();
1357  current_context_ = -1;
1358  last_execution_status_ = moveit_controller_manager::ExecutionStatus::ABORTED;
1359  ROS_ERROR_NAMED(name_, "No controller handle for controller '%s'. Aborting.",
1360  context.controllers_[i].c_str());
1361  return false;
1362  }
1363  active_handles_[i] = h;
1364  }
1365  handles = active_handles_; // keep a copy for later, to avoid thread safety issues
1366  for (std::size_t i = 0; i < context.trajectory_parts_.size(); ++i)
1367  {
1368  bool ok = false;
1369  try
1370  {
1371  ok = active_handles_[i]->sendTrajectory(context.trajectory_parts_[i]);
1372  }
1373  catch (std::exception& ex)
1374  {
1375  ROS_ERROR_NAMED(name_, "Caught %s when sending trajectory to controller", ex.what());
1376  }
1377  if (!ok)
1378  {
1379  for (std::size_t j = 0; j < i; ++j)
1380  try
1381  {
1382  active_handles_[j]->cancelExecution();
1383  }
1384  catch (std::exception& ex)
1385  {
1386  ROS_ERROR_NAMED(name_, "Caught %s when canceling execution", ex.what());
1387  }
1388  ROS_ERROR_NAMED(name_, "Failed to send trajectory part %zu of %zu to controller %s", i + 1,
1389  context.trajectory_parts_.size(), active_handles_[i]->getName().c_str());
1390  if (i > 0)
1391  ROS_ERROR_NAMED(name_, "Cancelling previously sent trajectory parts");
1392  active_handles_.clear();
1393  current_context_ = -1;
1394  last_execution_status_ = moveit_controller_manager::ExecutionStatus::ABORTED;
1395  return false;
1396  }
1397  }
1398  }
1399  }
1400 
1401  // compute the expected duration of the trajectory and find the part of the trajectory that takes longest to execute
1402  ros::Time current_time = ros::Time::now();
1403  ros::Duration expected_trajectory_duration(0.0);
1404  int longest_part = -1;
1405  for (std::size_t i = 0; i < context.trajectory_parts_.size(); ++i)
1406  {
1407  ros::Duration d(0.0);
1408  if (!(context.trajectory_parts_[i].joint_trajectory.points.empty() &&
1409  context.trajectory_parts_[i].multi_dof_joint_trajectory.points.empty()))
1410  {
1411  if (context.trajectory_parts_[i].joint_trajectory.header.stamp > current_time)
1412  d = context.trajectory_parts_[i].joint_trajectory.header.stamp - current_time;
1413  if (context.trajectory_parts_[i].multi_dof_joint_trajectory.header.stamp > current_time)
1414  d = std::max(d, context.trajectory_parts_[i].multi_dof_joint_trajectory.header.stamp - current_time);
1415  d += std::max(context.trajectory_parts_[i].joint_trajectory.points.empty() ?
1416  ros::Duration(0.0) :
1417  context.trajectory_parts_[i].joint_trajectory.points.back().time_from_start,
1418  context.trajectory_parts_[i].multi_dof_joint_trajectory.points.empty() ?
1419  ros::Duration(0.0) :
1420  context.trajectory_parts_[i].multi_dof_joint_trajectory.points.back().time_from_start);
1421 
1422  if (longest_part < 0 ||
1423  std::max(context.trajectory_parts_[i].joint_trajectory.points.size(),
1424  context.trajectory_parts_[i].multi_dof_joint_trajectory.points.size()) >
1425  std::max(context.trajectory_parts_[longest_part].joint_trajectory.points.size(),
1426  context.trajectory_parts_[longest_part].multi_dof_joint_trajectory.points.size()))
1427  longest_part = i;
1428  }
1429 
1430  // prefer controller-specific values over global ones if defined
1431  // TODO: the controller-specific parameters are static, but override
1432  // the global ones are configurable via dynamic reconfigure
1433  std::map<std::string, double>::const_iterator scaling_it =
1434  controller_allowed_execution_duration_scaling_.find(context.controllers_[i]);
1435  const double current_scaling = scaling_it != controller_allowed_execution_duration_scaling_.end() ?
1436  scaling_it->second :
1437  allowed_execution_duration_scaling_;
1438 
1439  std::map<std::string, double>::const_iterator margin_it =
1440  controller_allowed_goal_duration_margin_.find(context.controllers_[i]);
1441  const double current_margin = margin_it != controller_allowed_goal_duration_margin_.end() ?
1442  margin_it->second :
1443  allowed_goal_duration_margin_;
1444 
1445  // expected duration is the duration of the longest part
1446  expected_trajectory_duration =
1447  std::max(d * current_scaling + ros::Duration(current_margin), expected_trajectory_duration);
1448  }
1449 
1450  // construct a map from expected time to state index, for easy access to expected state location
1451  if (longest_part >= 0)
1452  {
1453  boost::mutex::scoped_lock slock(time_index_mutex_);
1454 
1455  if (context.trajectory_parts_[longest_part].joint_trajectory.points.size() >=
1456  context.trajectory_parts_[longest_part].multi_dof_joint_trajectory.points.size())
1457  {
1458  ros::Duration d(0.0);
1459  if (context.trajectory_parts_[longest_part].joint_trajectory.header.stamp > current_time)
1460  d = context.trajectory_parts_[longest_part].joint_trajectory.header.stamp - current_time;
1461  for (trajectory_msgs::JointTrajectoryPoint& point :
1462  context.trajectory_parts_[longest_part].joint_trajectory.points)
1463  time_index_.push_back(current_time + d + point.time_from_start);
1464  }
1465  else
1466  {
1467  ros::Duration d(0.0);
1468  if (context.trajectory_parts_[longest_part].multi_dof_joint_trajectory.header.stamp > current_time)
1469  d = context.trajectory_parts_[longest_part].multi_dof_joint_trajectory.header.stamp - current_time;
1470  for (trajectory_msgs::MultiDOFJointTrajectoryPoint& point :
1471  context.trajectory_parts_[longest_part].multi_dof_joint_trajectory.points)
1472  time_index_.push_back(current_time + d + point.time_from_start);
1473  }
1474  }
1475 
1476  bool result = true;
1477  for (moveit_controller_manager::MoveItControllerHandlePtr& handle : handles)
1478  {
1479  if (execution_duration_monitoring_)
1480  {
1481  if (!handle->waitForExecution(expected_trajectory_duration))
1482  if (!execution_complete_ && ros::Time::now() - current_time > expected_trajectory_duration)
1483  {
1484  ROS_ERROR_NAMED(name_,
1485  "Controller is taking too long to execute trajectory (the expected upper "
1486  "bound for the trajectory execution was %lf seconds). Stopping trajectory.",
1487  expected_trajectory_duration.toSec());
1488  {
1489  boost::mutex::scoped_lock slock(execution_state_mutex_);
1490  stopExecutionInternal(); // this is really tricky. we can't call stopExecution() here, so we call the
1491  // internal function only
1492  }
1493  last_execution_status_ = moveit_controller_manager::ExecutionStatus::TIMED_OUT;
1494  result = false;
1495  break;
1496  }
1497  }
1498  else
1499  handle->waitForExecution();
1500 
1501  // if something made the trajectory stop, we stop this thread too
1502  if (execution_complete_)
1503  {
1504  result = false;
1505  break;
1506  }
1507  else if (handle->getLastExecutionStatus() != moveit_controller_manager::ExecutionStatus::SUCCEEDED)
1508  {
1509  ROS_WARN_STREAM_NAMED(name_, "Controller handle " << handle->getName() << " reports status "
1510  << handle->getLastExecutionStatus().asString());
1511  last_execution_status_ = handle->getLastExecutionStatus();
1512  result = false;
1513  }
1514  }
1515 
1516  // clear the active handles
1517  execution_state_mutex_.lock();
1518  active_handles_.clear();
1519 
1520  // clear the time index
1521  time_index_mutex_.lock();
1522  time_index_.clear();
1523  current_context_ = -1;
1524  time_index_mutex_.unlock();
1525 
1526  execution_state_mutex_.unlock();
1527  return result;
1528  }
1529  else
1530  {
1531  last_execution_status_ = moveit_controller_manager::ExecutionStatus::ABORTED;
1532  return false;
1533  }
1534 }
1535 
1536 bool TrajectoryExecutionManager::waitForRobotToStop(const TrajectoryExecutionContext& context, double wait_time)
1537 {
1538  // skip waiting for convergence?
1539  if (allowed_start_tolerance_ == 0 || !wait_for_trajectory_completion_)
1540  {
1541  ROS_DEBUG_NAMED(name_, "Not waiting for trajectory completion");
1542  return true;
1543  }
1544 
1545  ros::WallTime start = ros::WallTime::now();
1546  double time_remaining = wait_time;
1547 
1548  moveit::core::RobotStatePtr prev_state, cur_state;
1549  prev_state = csm_->getCurrentState();
1550  prev_state->enforceBounds();
1551 
1552  // assume robot stopped when 3 consecutive checks yield the same robot state
1553  unsigned int no_motion_count = 0; // count iterations with no motion
1554  while (time_remaining > 0. && no_motion_count < 3)
1555  {
1556  if (!csm_->waitForCurrentState(ros::Time::now(), time_remaining) || !(cur_state = csm_->getCurrentState()))
1557  {
1558  ROS_WARN_NAMED(name_, "Failed to receive current joint state");
1559  return false;
1560  }
1561  cur_state->enforceBounds();
1562  time_remaining = wait_time - (ros::WallTime::now() - start).toSec(); // remaining wait_time
1563 
1564  // check for motion in effected joints of execution context
1565  bool moved = false;
1566  for (const auto& trajectory : context.trajectory_parts_)
1567  {
1568  const std::vector<std::string>& joint_names = trajectory.joint_trajectory.joint_names;
1569  const std::size_t n = joint_names.size();
1570 
1571  for (std::size_t i = 0; i < n && !moved; ++i)
1572  {
1573  const moveit::core::JointModel* jm = cur_state->getJointModel(joint_names[i]);
1574  if (!jm)
1575  continue; // joint vanished from robot state (shouldn't happen), but we don't care
1576 
1577  if (fabs(cur_state->getJointPositions(jm)[0] - prev_state->getJointPositions(jm)[0]) > allowed_start_tolerance_)
1578  {
1579  moved = true;
1580  no_motion_count = 0;
1581  break;
1582  }
1583  }
1584  }
1585 
1586  if (!moved)
1587  ++no_motion_count;
1588 
1589  std::swap(prev_state, cur_state);
1590  }
1591 
1592  return time_remaining > 0;
1593 }
1594 
1595 std::pair<int, int> TrajectoryExecutionManager::getCurrentExpectedTrajectoryIndex() const
1596 {
1597  boost::mutex::scoped_lock slock(time_index_mutex_);
1598  if (current_context_ < 0)
1599  return std::make_pair(-1, -1);
1600  if (time_index_.empty())
1601  return std::make_pair((int)current_context_, -1);
1602  std::vector<ros::Time>::const_iterator time_index_it =
1603  std::lower_bound(time_index_.begin(), time_index_.end(), ros::Time::now());
1604  int pos = time_index_it - time_index_.begin();
1605  return std::make_pair((int)current_context_, pos);
1606 }
1607 
1608 const std::vector<TrajectoryExecutionManager::TrajectoryExecutionContext*>&
1609 TrajectoryExecutionManager::getTrajectories() const
1610 {
1611  return trajectories_;
1612 }
1613 
1614 moveit_controller_manager::ExecutionStatus TrajectoryExecutionManager::getLastExecutionStatus() const
1615 {
1616  return last_execution_status_;
1617 }
1618 
1619 bool TrajectoryExecutionManager::ensureActiveControllersForGroup(const std::string& group)
1620 {
1621  const moveit::core::JointModelGroup* joint_model_group = robot_model_->getJointModelGroup(group);
1622  if (joint_model_group)
1623  return ensureActiveControllersForJoints(joint_model_group->getJointModelNames());
1624  else
1625  return false;
1626 }
1627 
1628 bool TrajectoryExecutionManager::ensureActiveControllersForJoints(const std::vector<std::string>& joints)
1629 {
1630  std::vector<std::string> all_controller_names;
1631  for (std::map<std::string, ControllerInformation>::const_iterator it = known_controllers_.begin();
1632  it != known_controllers_.end(); ++it)
1633  all_controller_names.push_back(it->first);
1634  std::vector<std::string> selected_controllers;
1635  std::set<std::string> jset;
1636  for (const std::string& joint : joints)
1637  {
1638  const moveit::core::JointModel* jm = robot_model_->getJointModel(joint);
1639  if (jm)
1640  {
1641  if (jm->isPassive() || jm->getMimic() != nullptr || jm->getType() == moveit::core::JointModel::FIXED)
1642  continue;
1643  jset.insert(joint);
1644  }
1645  }
1646 
1647  if (selectControllers(jset, all_controller_names, selected_controllers))
1648  return ensureActiveControllers(selected_controllers);
1649  else
1650  return false;
1651 }
1652 
1653 bool TrajectoryExecutionManager::ensureActiveController(const std::string& controller)
1654 {
1655  return ensureActiveControllers(std::vector<std::string>(1, controller));
1656 }
1657 
1658 bool TrajectoryExecutionManager::ensureActiveControllers(const std::vector<std::string>& controllers)
1659 {
1660  updateControllersState(DEFAULT_CONTROLLER_INFORMATION_VALIDITY_AGE);
1661 
1662  if (manage_controllers_)
1663  {
1664  std::vector<std::string> controllers_to_activate;
1665  std::vector<std::string> controllers_to_deactivate;
1666  std::set<std::string> joints_to_be_activated;
1667  std::set<std::string> joints_to_be_deactivated;
1668  for (const std::string& controller : controllers)
1669  {
1670  std::map<std::string, ControllerInformation>::const_iterator it = known_controllers_.find(controller);
1671  if (it == known_controllers_.end())
1672  {
1673  ROS_ERROR_STREAM_NAMED(name_, "Controller " << controller << " is not known");
1674  return false;
1675  }
1676  if (!it->second.state_.active_)
1677  {
1678  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM_NAMED(name_, "Need to activate " << controller);
1679  controllers_to_activate.push_back(controller);
1680  joints_to_be_activated.insert(it->second.joints_.begin(), it->second.joints_.end());
1681  for (const std::string& overlapping_controller : it->second.overlapping_controllers_)
1682  {
1683  const ControllerInformation& ci = known_controllers_[overlapping_controller];
1684  if (ci.state_.active_)
1685  {
1686  controllers_to_deactivate.push_back(overlapping_controller);
1687  joints_to_be_deactivated.insert(ci.joints_.begin(), ci.joints_.end());
1688  }
1689  }
1690  }
1691  else
1692  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM_NAMED(name_, "Controller " << controller << " is already active");
1693  }
1694  std::set<std::string> diff;
1695  std::set_difference(joints_to_be_deactivated.begin(), joints_to_be_deactivated.end(),
1696  joints_to_be_activated.begin(), joints_to_be_activated.end(), std::inserter(diff, diff.end()));
1697  if (!diff.empty())
1698  {
1699  // find the set of controllers that do not overlap with the ones we want to activate so far
1700  std::vector<std::string> possible_additional_controllers;
1701  for (std::map<std::string, ControllerInformation>::const_iterator it = known_controllers_.begin();
1702  it != known_controllers_.end(); ++it)
1703  {
1704  bool ok = true;
1705  for (const std::string& controller_to_activate : controllers_to_activate)
1706  if (it->second.overlapping_controllers_.find(controller_to_activate) !=
1707  it->second.overlapping_controllers_.end())
1708  {
1709  ok = false;
1710  break;
1711  }
1712  if (ok)
1713  possible_additional_controllers.push_back(it->first);
1714  }
1715 
1716  // out of the allowable controllers, try to find a subset of controllers that covers the joints to be actuated
1717  std::vector<std::string> additional_controllers;
1718  if (selectControllers(diff, possible_additional_controllers, additional_controllers))
1719  controllers_to_activate.insert(controllers_to_activate.end(), additional_controllers.begin(),
1720  additional_controllers.end());
1721  else
1722  return false;
1723  }
1724  if (!controllers_to_activate.empty() || !controllers_to_deactivate.empty())
1725  {
1726  if (controller_manager_)
1727  {
1728  // load controllers to be activated, if needed, and reset the state update cache
1729  for (const std::string& controller_to_activate : controllers_to_activate)
1730  {
1731  ControllerInformation& ci = known_controllers_[controller_to_activate];
1732  ci.last_update_ = ros::Time();
1733  }
1734  // reset the state update cache
1735  for (const std::string& controller_to_activate : controllers_to_deactivate)
1736  known_controllers_[controller_to_activate].last_update_ = ros::Time();
1737  return controller_manager_->switchControllers(controllers_to_activate, controllers_to_deactivate);
1738  }
1739  else
1740  return false;
1741  }
1742  else
1743  return true;
1744  }
1745  else
1746  {
1747  std::set<std::string> originally_active;
1748  for (std::map<std::string, ControllerInformation>::const_iterator it = known_controllers_.begin();
1749  it != known_controllers_.end(); ++it)
1750  if (it->second.state_.active_)
1751  originally_active.insert(it->first);
1752  return std::includes(originally_active.begin(), originally_active.end(), controllers.begin(), controllers.end());
1753  }
1754 }
1755 
1756 void TrajectoryExecutionManager::loadControllerParams()
1757 {
1758  XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue controller_list;
1759  if (node_handle_.getParam("controller_list", controller_list) &&
1760  controller_list.getType() == XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue::TypeArray)
1761  {
1762  for (int i = 0; i < controller_list.size(); ++i) // NOLINT(modernize-loop-convert)
1763  {
1764  XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue& controller = controller_list[i];
1765  if (controller.hasMember("name"))
1766  {
1767  if (controller.hasMember("allowed_execution_duration_scaling"))
1768  controller_allowed_execution_duration_scaling_[std::string(controller["name"])] =
1769  controller["allowed_execution_duration_scaling"];
1770  if (controller.hasMember("allowed_goal_duration_margin"))
1771  controller_allowed_goal_duration_margin_[std::string(controller["name"])] =
1772  controller["allowed_goal_duration_margin"];
1773  }
1774  }
1775  }
1776 }
1777 } // namespace trajectory_execution_manager
